title: Law Minister congratulates newly elected president SCBA
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 29 (APP):Minister for Law and Justice, Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar on Tuesday congratulated Mian Rauf Atta for being elected as president (SCBA).
He congratulated to all group leaders including Mr Ahsan Bhawan, head of Asma Jahangir Group, for their historical victory in the elections of the Supreme Court Bar Association (SCBA).
The Law minister said that he is expecting that Mian Rauf Atta will continue the mission of welfare of bar and lawyers. He said that the Independent Group has always done politics of principles and upheld the supremacy of constitution and law.
